column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kai says : " Hey , what 's your boyfriend doing here ? "
#Text=Opal says : " If he 's here , he must be with Kuvira and my brother .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Kai !
#Text=Wow , you are a lot heavier than you used to be .
#Text=You 're really growing up .
#Text=" Kai says : " What 's up with your new hair ?
#Text=You look like a stiff .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey , Kuvira says it makes me look intelligent and professional .
#Text=" Opal says : " Do n't believe everything she says .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Opal , I ca n't believe you 're here too !
#Text=I missed you so much .
#Text=" Opal says : " I missed you too .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Look who it is .
#Text=It 's good to see you again , little sister .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " What a wonderful surprise .
#Text=A happy reunion for my favorite couple .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " How 's Mom doing ?
#Text=" Opal says : " Like you care .
#Text=She still has n't forgiven you .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " You know , for someone who claims to be so enlightened , Mom can really hold a grudge .
#Text=" Opal says : " I guess when her son betrays her ... " Kuvira says : " Please , Opal , we 're not here to bicker with you about something that happened three years ago .
#Text=We 're here to help this town , just like you .
#Text=" Opal says : " I 've heard how you help towns .
#Text=By conquering them .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I know the rumors about me can be pretty nasty , but I am giving everyone in this nation a better future .
#Text=And with Bolin 's help , and my fiancé 's ideas , we 're laying the ground work for the people to achieve their own greatness .
#Text=" Opal says : " Your fiancé ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You have n't heard ?
#Text=Your brother and I are getting married .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Is n't that great , sweetie ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I know things got heated with your family when Baatar and I left Zaofu , but do n't you think it 's time to forgive and forget ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Hello , governor .
#Text=I was wondering if you and I could talk privately .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " So , have you had time to rethink my generous offer ?
#Text=" Governor says : " Generous ?
#Text=You want to take everything .
#Text=How is that generous ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Governor , your state has been overrun by bandits .
#Text=They have you outnumbered and outsupplied .
#Text=The question 's not if they 'll take over ; it 's when .
#Text=Unless you sign our deal .
#Text=Agree to the terms , and you 'll have the full force of my army backing you .
#Text=You will remain in charge , just under my supervision .
#Text=I will save your life , and the lives of your citizens .
#Text=I think that 's pretty generous .
#Text=" Governor says : " I know how you manipulate states , and force them to join up under you .
#Text=I know the only reason you want this region is because it is rich in ore .
#Text=They might call you " The Great Uniter " , but you 're destroying everything !
#Text=I 'll never turn the great state of Yi over to you !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You have a lot of pride , but it can not protect your people .
#Text=Your pride will not stop the hordes as your city crumbles to the ground .
#Text=And your pride will certainly not feed your hungry when all that is left is rubble !
#Text=" Governor says : " Leave !
#Text=Get out of my state !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " You will perish , unless you take my generous offer .
#Text="
